program PRUEBA; 
main () { 
    entero a = 0;
    entero b = 1;
    entero c = 0;
    entero x = 1;
    entero n = 10;

    if (10 == 0) then {
        write();
    }
    else{
        if (10 == 1) then{
            write();
        }
        else{
          while(x > 10)do{
            c = a + b;
            a = b;
            b = c;
          }
        write();
        }
        
        
    }
}
